==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=uc|rs=木07}}

====Readings====
* {{ja-readings|on=[[こく]] (koku), [[かく]] (kaku)|kun=[[てかせ]] (tekase)}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|梏桎|こくしつ}}: [[manacles]] and [[shackles]]
* {{ja-r|桎梏|しっこく}}: [[shackles]] and [[manacles]]

===Etymology===
Alteration from older form てかし, itself a compound of {{m|ja|手||hand|tr=te}} + {{m|ja|架す||to bridge, to join two sides|tr=kasu}}.

====Noun====
# [[manacles]], [[handcuffs]]

=====Usage notes=====
This kanji is seldom used to spell the word てかせ. More common spellings include:
* {{l|ja|手枷}}
* {{l|ja|手械}}
* {{l|ja|手桎}}
